message.body: In line for beer. Sure u don't want one?
Witness to another bike vs car incident. Car's fault, bicyclist flipped out. Driver of BMW stayed safely within the car.
Oh no. No one hurt I hope?

Fortunately no one hurt but could have easily gone the other way. The driver completely cut the cyclist off but without a bike lane u don't think about anyone passing u to the right when u are in the right lane. I'm sure it wasn't intentional but still upsetting for both parties.
